MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY11 postcode area of Dunfermline. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9pm to allow emergency repair work for a third party and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:29PM on Friday 05 February 2021.
